Class ConvertersConfigurationHolder

java.lang.Object
  org.codehaus.groovy.grails.web.converters.configuration.ConvertersConfigurationHolder

public class ConvertersConfigurationHolder
extends Object

Singleton which holds all default and named configurations for the Converter classes

1.1

Siegfried Puchbauer
